channel.title: Me on Felipe Warrener-Iglesias
channel.description: Recent content in Me on Felipe Warrener-Iglesias

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a 19 year-old security researcher and information-security enthusiast from the United Kingdom. I am interested in all areas of hacking but some of my favourites are: Reverse-engineering Binary exploitation Web/Infrastructure penetration-testing I was first attracted to computer security after being fascinated by cheaters I encountered in online games, specifically the challenge of making a system work in ways unintended. I’m driven today by that same fascination and challenge, I think computer security and vulnerability research are the coolest things on Earth.
